quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
Motivation gets you started. Habit keeps you going.
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
Small disciplines repeated with consistency every day lead to great achievements over time.
The secret of your success is found in your daily routine.
It’s not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives. It’s what we do consistently.
Your habits will determine your future.
Every action you take is a vote for the type of person you want to become.
Change might not be fast, and it isn’t always easy. But with time and effort, almost any habit can be reshaped.
The chains of habit are too light to be felt until they are too heavy to be broken.
Don’t wait for inspiration. Build the habit, and inspiration will come.
Consistency is what transforms average into excellence.
What you do every day matters more than what you do once in a while.
Habits are the compound interest of self-improvement.
Success doesn’t come from what you do occasionally, but from what you do consistently.
